text: Jet Solidaire is a private jet company located in Issy-les-Moulineaux, close to Paris, and created in 2014 by Sébastien Dequenne.Sébastien Dequenne Its particularity is it is a social company. 25% of profits are giving back to associations to fight against poverty.Jet Solidaire : des jets d'affaires au service des plus pauvres The company also offers to its customers to compensate their CO2 emissions thanks to a partnership with the GoodPlanet Foundation.Jet Solidaire The company is in partnership with Aviation Sans Frontières, Les Avions du Bonheur and Les Enfants du Canal associations.A découvrir : Jet Solidaire !Valljet s'allie à Jet Solidaire pour une mission == References == ==Other websites== * Official website Category:2014 establishments in Europe Category:2010s establishments in France Category:Aviation in France
title: Jet Solidaire
